main event: Witness observed a bright red light in the sky that hovered, then moved straight across for about half a mile before going straight up and disappearing on May 8, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes with a single small object observed,The object was concluded to be a balloon,The witness initially thought the object was an Xray-15,The object changed its course from hovering to moving straight, and then disappeared,The witness was alone in their car at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Male, age 45, alone in car at the time of the sighting.
